div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1082 Tokarevka (formerly Poniatovka), (825) Belozerka raion, Kherson oblast, Ukraine, 1824 Burial: c. 300-250 B.C. Contents: c. 600 AE. Pot hoard Olbia: AE; (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 26-29) Disposition: dispersed Goshkevich, pp. 41, 73 Stempkovskii, Bibliograficheskie listy 24 (St. Pe- tersburg, 1825, publ. 1826), p. 336 = Journal de St. Petersbourg 1825, p. 506, no. 118
